text: "Renegades of Funk" is a 1984 song by Afrika Bambaataa and was later included on the 1986 album Planet Rock: The Album. ==Rage Against the Machine cover== In 2000, Rage Against the Machine covered Renegades of Funk for their covers album Renegades. In addition to lyrics by Afrika Bambaataa and features percussion interpolation from Apache from 1960 and Cheap Trick single Gonna Raise Hell from 1979. == References == Category:1983 songs Category:Rage Against the Machine songs Category:Hip hop songs Category:Rap rock songs
title: Renegades of Funk
